body.name: Mounting Dream UL Listed TV Wall Mount for Most 42-84 Inch TV, Full Motion TV Mount with Swivel and Tilt, TV Bracket with Articulating Dual Arms, Fits 16inch Studs, Max VESA 600X400 mm, 100 lbs,MD2617
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 17 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 17 mins
features: [Universal Design] This TV wall mount is compatible with most TVs of 42-84 inches and weighs up to 100 lbs. It also has a maximum VESA of 600mm x 400 mm mounting hole space. Please Note: This TV mounting bracket is NOT for drywall alone installation!

[Intriguing Flexibility] This full motion TV mount tilts the TV 5° up and 15° down to avoid glare and swivels the TV left or right according to your seat position. It pulls out to 16.6 inches and retracts to 2.5 inches, allowing your TV to move. After installation, +/-4° post-installation adjustment allows for optimum TV leveling.

[Sturdy and Safe] Mounting Dream TV wall mount swivel and tilt designed with 6 articulating arms. The Wall mount for TV is constructed of high-quality cold-formed steel for the ultimate safety and reliability to keep your TV and family safe.

[Hassle Less Installation] Mounting Dream wall mounts comes with clear instructions and all hardware in pre-labeled bags. The paper template and 4 cable clips are good helpers to make the installation easier and quicker. Concrete anchors can be provided upon request (Anchor Size: φ10x50mm).
[Installation Support] What are you waiting for? Let 's get that TV mounted! Have any pre-purchase or installation questions? Mounting Dream staffs are 7 days a week to help if you run into a snag.

Will this mount fit our TV? Please check the specs below: 1 TV size and weight 2 TV VESA pattern and cable outlet 3 The wall type of Mounting Location (wood stud spacing/solid concrete wall) Does it come with necessary parts and instruction to mount？ Mounting Dream packages are included with TV bolts and wall installation hardware to complete the installation. Will this mount work on drywall/plaster walls? Mounting Dream mounts are only safe/recommended for wood studs and solid concrete walls, but not for dry wall alone.The hardware included in the package is only for wood studs and concrete/brick wall applications. How do I request anchors for installing on a concrete wall? Additional concrete anchors are available through Mounting Dream team(Concrete Anchor Size: φ10x50mm).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This exceeded all expectations. Installation was easy and straightforward. This sturdy design gives me complete confidence that it will support my television. The tilt and swivel feature allows for comfortable viewing at different angles for screen positioning. It's a reliable choice for anyone looking for a secure and compatible tv mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy install, all parts present
reviews.reviewText: The install of this mount was great. The material is robust where needed and thin in some areas but overall sturdy mount. I enjoyed the tilt feature as I mounted the tv (75”) over a fireplace. Would recommend to others looking for an affordable no nonsense tv mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to put together and use. Very simple and has everything you need to mount to wall.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used a couple of different brands to mount TVs and this has got to be the best built, quality, Best Buy for the money and easiest Mount to put together. I have everything from a 32” to a 85” hanging on these mounts and they have not let me down yet. The range of motion with the TVs are great you can move them so you can see or just so you can plug things into the back. These are full motion mounts so the TV is not snug to the wall but the fact you can move your TV where you want to see it well makes up for the extra space showing behind the TV. The plus side for the TV sitting off the wall is it gives it room to breath. If you do not need a full motion the Flat wall works great and is very easy to hang your TV. These are great mounts for the money. You can spend up to $650 on a wall mount but it’s not going to do anything this one can’t.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Customer Service!
reviews.reviewText: Not only was this a great and sturdy TV mount, the customer service was exceptional! I sought their assistance for a piece that was missing from the box we received from Amazon. They were extremely easy to contact, efficient in their responses, and very easy to communicate with (no language barriers either). I even received a follow up to ensure we had received what we needed! Great company and I highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Sturdy. Easy to mount tv to bracket. However, screw broke when trying to secure tv to wall plate. Love the full motion ability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy we purchased this
reviews.reviewText: We are pretty happy with this mount. It does the job and we like that we can maneuver our tv to any direction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a heavy mount
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mount for my new 65" TV. It arrived on time and was much heavier than I anticipated, which is a good thing. It was packed well and all the parts were there in good condition. Since these type mounts are universal, you have to determine how and where to attach the Two hanging brackets to your particular TV. The parts bags include several size spacers, screws & washers for you to select from for your unit. Just remember there are extra parts and you will not use all of them. The instructions are good but take the time to study the details of assembly before you jump into it. This mount MUST be attached to framing studs in your wall. Fortunately, I found Two studs at almost the exact position (horizontally) that I wanted the TV. There is a cardboard template supplied with the mount that makes it easy to mark the screw hole locations once you determine the proper height and since I could not mount the brackets centered on the back of my TV (they had to mount below centerline), it took some calculating to get the mount in the right vertical position. Once mounted to the wall, hanging the TV is a piece of cake BUT, in my case required Two people. I could have probably wrestled it onto the hangers myself but I didn't want to risk damaging a brand new TV. The articulated arms to move the TV out from the wall and side to side are stiff enough that the TV stays where you put it. Vertical angle adjustment is accomplished with a small hex wrench provided to loosen a screw on the tilt mechanism. This little wrench can be stored on the mount. All in all I consider this mount near commercial quality and am very pleased with it. Believe me, it's well worth the few extra dollars over the cheapies out there.NOTE: If you cannot mount to framing studs, use the type of wall anchors that have spring loaded legs that expand when you push them through the drywall. I would not trust anything else.NOTE 2: Use a level with the template. There is a level adjustment but it's range is minimal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good, I bought two!
reviews.reviewText: Heavy duty, easy to install.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cumple a la perfección con su función
reviews.reviewText: Llegó muy bien y con todas sus piezas bien acomodadas y con adaptadores para diferentes modelos de tv, es fácil de entender el instructivo y cumple su función a la perfección, aguanta muy bien y se siente la calidad desde que lo recibes. 100% recomendado.

Easy assembly. All the parts are of decent quality. Hardest part is figuring out perfect height to install bracket. Would be awesome if there was a mark on the brackets you bolt onto back of tv that indicate how they line up to the bracket that bolts to the wall so you can quickly do the math when attaching to the TV.Also, as others have stated, the smaller bracket means you don't have any flexibility when it comes to centering bracket side to side. Easily fixed with a solid peice of plywood or 1 8' 2x4 cut in half. But then your TV will stick out further from the wall so not great if you can see behind TV.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente compra y facil de instalar
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto el diseño. Es robusto.Quedo super bien y fijo a la pared.Si soporta el peso indicado hasta un poco mas. Yo me colgue por 30seg y resistio sin problema alguno. Si volviera a tener otra tv de 75pulg volveria a pedir este producto. Compre con confianza. Este articulo es excelente

Instructions were clear and easy to follow. Some assembly required for framing the bracket. Use a wrench socket to anchor wood stud lag bolts (provided). Ensure to have a stud finder to assist. Concrete walls lugs are not provided. Bracket spacing max is 16” - if your studs are wider than this, this bracket will not work. A large variety of TV bolts and spacers are provided - so if your TV has a curved back or deep recessed screw positions - these a spacer, bolt length combination that should be compatible. Installed a Sony Bravia 75” TV with no issues.
lo instale muy rápido y las instrucciones son muy clarasmuy buen producto, cumple de manera muy eficiente
